p: Pre-treatment and 3-month post-treatment blood samples were collected into Tempus™ Blood RNA Tubes (3 ml) (Applied Biosystems, Foster City, CA, USA). Once collected, samples were shipped to the Versus Arthritis Centre for Genetics and Genomics laboratory for central processing. Samples were logged onto the laboratory information management system (LIMS) and were stored at − 80 °C until RNA isolation.
